about_the_game:
Spawn, loot and try to stay alive alone or with your team to escape the island in the time available to you. Collaborate with other players or fight to stay alive and find one of the possible escape routes. Immerse yourself in this Military Survival Tactical game where your goal is only one: to extract alive.

SURVIVE
Try to survive in this game, eat, drink, recover your energy... Try to survive in a world of about 200km.

DEFEAT YOR ENEMY OR TRY TO ESCAPE WITH THEM
Play as a lone wolf or try to cooperate with your enemy. The strategy is up to you.

ESCAPE
Look for an escape route, but be careful not all exits are always open, some will only be activated by performing certain actions.

REALITY
Everything is detail, weapon ballistics faithful to reality, precise hitboxes and real wounds.

RAID
In this game time is everything, but to fully appreciate the raids it will take about two hours! Will you be able to escape in time or will you die before zero?

PLAN YOUR MOVES AND TACTIC
To be able to escape you will have to build a precise tactic. The AI ​​will hunt you down just like the other players, study everything down to the smallest detail.

AI
The AI ​​of this game will be one of its strong points. Artificial intelligence like you've never seen before
